original_text: Jesus and his disciples were coming near to Jerusalem. They were almost at the villages called Bethphage and Bethany. They were on the Mount of Olives. Then Jesus sent two of his disciples to go further.
korean_text: 그들이 예루살렘에 가까이 와서 감람 산 벳바게와 베다니에 이르렀을 때에 예수께서 제자 중 둘을 보내시며

sentences.original_text: Jesus and his disciples were coming near to Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님과 그의 제자들이 예루살렘에 가까이 오고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were almost at the villages called Bethphage and Bethany.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 벳바게와 베다니라 불리는 마을에 거의 도착했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were on the Mount of Olives.
Then Jesus sent two of his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 제자 두 사람을 보내셨습니다.
